name: github-summary-chrome-extension
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; font-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 https://api.github.com; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
